segments.text: I'm sorry to make you wait . What did you decide ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I wasn't planning on spending that much money today , so ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Trust me , it's worth it . With the " Love , Amy Card " , you'll get a 20 percent discount on everything in the store , every time you shop !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Even if an item is on sale ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes ! And there are more bargains . See these pajamas ? If you buy a pair now , you get this teddy bear as a gift !
segments.speaker: S1
